document.masterDocTitle: A revision of Leptobium CASEY. VIII. A new species from Iran, a new synonymy, and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of Leptobium CASEY. VIII. A new species from Iran, a new synonymy, and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae)

16.VI.1997

.

C o m m e n t: The above specimen from Pakistan would represent the first record of
Leptobium
from this country and expand the known range of
L. syriacum
eastwards by nearly 3000 km . However, since this record is far outside the previously known distribution, it requires confirmation. The specimen may be mislabelled; the collector was in Lebanon in the same year.
